service-agreement.information: Please read the terms of use before starting the consultation. Please note the following:
service-agreement.no-diagnosis-intro: The result of the consultation does not constitute a diagnosis.
service-agreement.no-diagnosis-text: The consultation is for informational purposes only and should under no circumstances be considered as an expert opinion from a qualified doctor. The consultation and its eventual results are based exclusively on the guidelines of the WHO and the CDC regarding COVID-19.
service-agreement.not-in-emergency-intro: Do not use in an emergency.
service-agreement.not-in-emergency-text: In the event of an severe emergency, please contact your local emergency number immediately.
service-agreement.data-protection-text: The information provided for the purpose of the consultation is anonymous and will not be passed on to anyone.
service-agreement.agreement: I have read the terms of use and the privacy policy and accept them.

interview.intro: Now please provide detailed information about your symptoms on the following pages
interview.one-answer-each-row: Choose an answer on each line.

errors.could-not-load-data: Data could not load. Please try again later.
